seconds.name: EdAd - CPA - Silver Rhino Final Blackout
seconds.JSON:
China’s “Stealth War” Against the U.S. Has Already Begun

While the world watches conflicts unfold in Ukraine and the Middle East, another global power is making quiet but strategic moves. Unlike traditional warfare, this battle isn't fought with missiles or tanks—it’s fought in the shadows.

China has been executing a covert campaign against the United States, influencing key industries, cyber networks, and economic policies without firing a single shot. Yet, few Americans are even aware of the silent war happening right now.

A newly released documentary uncovers the full extent of China’s hidden strategy and what every American must know to prepare for what’s coming next. This eye-opening film is streaming free of charge on a private, uncensored platform.

Watch the full documentary now before it's too late. Click here to watch.
